name: Feed the Furnace
description:
You must keep the Furnace stoked and alive. You will frantically run around breaking chairs and throwing their wood into the Furnace. If it goes out, you’re done for. But, you’ll be racing the clock as the Furnace’s demands get bigger and bigger.

Controls

Arrow Keys - Movement

Space Bar - Interaction (Break Chairs, Pick Up Wood, Buy Upgrades, etc.)

Upgrades

Put Wood into the Sawmill instead of the Furnace to gain Build Points, these can be spent to buy more Trucks or you can buy stuff in the Shop.

  • Boots give you faster movement speed
  • Clover makes increases the amount of Wood that drops from Chairs you break
  • Bat makes your swing deal more damage to Chairs
  • Glove makes it so you can carry more Wood
  • Conveyor gives you 5 Conveyors that you can place on the floor, Wood will move along them in the direction placed. You can always pick the Conveyors back up after you’ve placed them.
  • Auto-Smasher gives you an Auto-Smasher that, when attached to a Truck, will smash the chairs for you.
